Room.Name: Highland Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking on Highland Avenue, east of the omnimous Dragon's Citadel.
Room.LongDescription: The entrance to the massive Dragon's Citadel is located off of Neilian Drive, just to the south of here. The massive structure has remained undisturbed for as long as anyone can remember because no one has ever been able to get into the Citadel past the Great Hall.
